name: REST API Connector
description: Generic REST API connector for polling data from any HTTP JSON API. Supports API key, bearer token, OAuth2, and basic authentication.
use_cases: Pull data from any REST API

entity.name: REST API
entity.description: Generic REST API connector for pulling data from HTTP JSON endpoints

placeholders.{{BASE_URL}}: Base URL for the REST API (e.g., https://api.example.com/v1)
placeholders.{{AUTH_TYPE}}: Authentication type: api_key, bearer, oauth2, basic, or none
placeholders.{{API_KEY}}: API key for authentication (encrypted, if using api_key auth)
placeholders.{{BEARER_TOKEN}}: Bearer token for authentication (encrypted, if using bearer auth)
placeholders.{{OAUTH_AUTH_URL}}: OAuth2 authorization URL (if using oauth2 auth)
placeholders.{{OAUTH_TOKEN_URL}}: OAuth2 token URL (if using oauth2 auth)
placeholders.{{PAGINATION_TYPE}}: Pagination type: offset, cursor, page, or link
